post.description: Create bot (Permission: BOTS_WRITE, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: pairs
parameters.description: Pass single pair to create SingleBot or any other number of pairs to create MultiBot

parameters.name: trailing_enabled
parameters.description: Enable trailing take profit. Binance only.

parameters.name: safety_order_step_percentage
parameters.description: Price deviation to open safety trades(percentage)

parameters.name: take_profit_type
parameters.description: Percentage: base – from base order, total – from total volume

parameters.name: strategy_list
parameters.description:
For manual signals: [{"strategy":"manual"}] or []
For non-stop(1 pair only): [{"strategy":"nonstop"}]
QFL: {"options": {"type": "original"}, {"percent": 3}, "strategy": "qfl"}]
TradingView: [{"options": {"time": "5m", "type": "buy_or_strong_buy"}, "strategy": "trading_view"}

parameters.name: stop_loss_timeout_in_seconds
parameters.description: StopLoss timeout in seconds if StopLoss timeout enabled

parameters.name: tsl_enabled
parameters.description: Enable trailing stop loss. Bitmex only.

parameters.name: disable_after_deals_count
parameters.description: Bot will be disabled after opening this number of deals

parameters.name: allowed_deals_on_same_pair
parameters.description: Allow specific number of deals on the same pair. Multibot only.

parameters.name: close_deals_timeout
parameters.description: Close bot deals after given number of seconds. Must be greater than 60.

parameters.name: instant
parameters.description: true for Simple Buy and Simple Sell

parameters.name: position[conditional][price][type]
parameters.description: By default ask for long, bid for short

parameters.name: position[conditional][trailing][percent]
parameters.description: Should be 100% in the sum of all steps

parameters.name: take_profit[steps][][price][value]
parameters.description: only if position has no trailing or position trailing is finished

parameters.name: take_profit[steps][][price][percent]
parameters.description: only if position has trailing and position trailing is not finished

parameters.name: stop_loss[conditional][price][value]
parameters.description: if position has no trailing or position trailing is finished

parameters.name: stop_loss[conditional][price][percent]
parameters.description: only if position has trailing and position trailing is not finished

status.description: Values: created, base_order_placed, bought, cancelled, completed, failed, panic_sell_pending, panic_sell_order_placed, panic_sold, cancel_pending, stop_loss_pending, stop_loss_finished, stop_loss_order_placed, switched, switched_take_profit, ttp_activated, ttp_order_placed, liquidated, bought_safety_pending, bought_take_profit_pending, settled

trailing_max_price.description: Highest price met in case of long deal, lowest price otherwise

tsl_max_price.description: Highest price met in TSL in case of long deal, lowest price otherwise

reserved_quote_funds.description: Sum of reserved in active deals funds in QUOTE

reserved_base_funds.description: Sum of reserved in active deals funds in BASE
